Sample / relevant sample part: premise: "So, I don't have any specific stories." hypothesis: "I dont have a particular store." label: 0 (entailment)
Issue: The plural form of "store" is not "stories", hence the label should be "neutral" and not "entailment".

Sample / relevant sample part: premise: "So it looked pretty sharp.", hypothesis: "The design was horrible.", label: 2 (contradiction)
